item.description:
New Spring Hours @ Alchemy:

Thursdays & Fridays from

11:30am-6:30pm

 

Spring is the season to cleanse with Imani Mamalution & Eden Love! Hands-on Demos, Classes, Lectures, Experiential Immersions, Personalized Programs,  Kitchen Make-overs, Consults, Catering & Group Cleanses.


check out our new website:

www.alchemyjuicebar.com

 

 

Fridays @ Alchemy - special seasonal entrée for dine-in or to-go (5-6:30pm) followed by a live food demo (6:30-7:30pm). High Vibe Tribe with gather for sauna, snuggling & sensual touch 7:30-9pm). Please register in advance for the evening demo ($30 includes entrée, demo & infrared sauna).  Note Alchemy is only open by appointment & for special events & programs. Our public  hours are Thursdays & Fridays 11:30am-6:30pm. Please call before visiting any other time! 860.246.5700.

 

SPRING SCHEDULE OF EVENTS:


Thurs 3/22- Equinox 10 Day Juicy Challenge – Day One  

Juicing Basics with Imani @ Alchemy 6:30pm

 

Friday 3/23 -Raw Entrée & Raw 101 with Imani & Eden Love

*the first talk in our living food demo series is free!

 

Thurs 3/29 – GMO & Gluten-free @ Downtown Yoga with Imani @ 7:15pm

 

Fri 3/30 – Raw Entrée & Decadent Desserts –part 1 with Eden Love

 

Sat 3/31- Tantra Immersion & Puja Ceremony with Ran/Imani Birthday Celebration & HVT Snuggle

 

Thurs 4/5- Intro to Juicing with Imani @ Downtown Yoga 7:15pm

 

Fri 4/6 Decadent Desserts –part 2 with Eden Love 

*Holiday raw pie order pick-ups @ Alchemy
item.name: Dinner @ Alchemy & Raw Food 101 Talk
